name: Christmas Hunt (MuFake)
description:
One Script Jam 2021 submission; Christmas Hunt.

Your goal is to collect all of the presents and candy canes, and return them to your cabin. You must maintain the fire by collecting firewood which is scattered around. If the fire goes out, your adventure is over. 

You can only hold 6 items at a time, you must return to the cabin to drop them off.

Each piece of firewood dropped off at the cabin adds time.

A little snowflake told me that a good tip would be to hunt around the snowmen ;)

Controls;

WASD - Movement

Left Mouse Click to collect

Credits:

BenWardon - Code

Wolfguts - Texture art

Minde - Model art

freesound.org - Sounds and music
